source_caption_data.pre_caption: This time-lapse video captures a massive dust storm, known as a haboob, rolling across a desert landscape. The scene features saguaro cacti and desert shrubs in the foreground with a mountain range in the background. The immense wall of orange-brown dust advances from left to right, engulfing the mountains and sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This time-lapse video captures a massive dust storm, known as a haboob, rolling across a desert landscape. The scene features saguaro cacti and desert shrubs in the foreground with a mountain range in the background. The immense wall of orange-brown dust advances from left to right, engulfing the mountains and sky.

generated_critique: The caption includes an introductory phrase ("This time-lapse video captures...") and descriptive details about the static scenery ("The scene features saguaro cacti...") that should be removed to focus solely on the motion. It also uses the subjective adjectives "massive" and "immense," which should be omitted. The description of the motion itself is accurate. To improve, the caption should be revised to describe only the movement of the dust storm.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A wall of orange-brown dust from a haboob advances from left to right, engulfing the mountains and sky.
